short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync your ATS with LinkedIn, and learn to love sourcing again!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMPORTANT UPDATE:  Parsley Shutting Down Due to LinkedIn Cease & Desist

Dear Valued Customers,

I regret to inform you that Parsley will be shutting down on March 15th.
This difficult decision is a direct result of a Cease & Desist letter from LinkedIn, which has raised concerns about our compliance with their Terms of Service.

While we believe we have not violated these terms, we must prioritize the well-being of our main business, the StaffUpApp staffing platform and mobile app. As LinkedIn is crucial to our marketing efforts, we cannot risk the potential repercussions that could adversely affect StaffUpApp, given their history of punitive measures against other founders and key personnel, such as blocking access.

I want to express my heartfelt gratitude for your support over the past four years. Your positive feedback and reviews have confirmed that Parsley has provided significant value to our industry. We created this service to enhance the community that has embraced StaffUpApp (staffupapp.com) and has given us hope for a bright future.

I understand that experiencing a service shutdown is inconvenient, and I assure you this decision was not made lightly.

Please note the following important details:

* Support emails will be answered through March 15th, 2025. After this date, we will no longer be able to respond, and access to the site will be disabled.

* Subscribers will be charged for January and February, but no fees will be applied in March.

If you have further questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out to me at rick@getparsley.net, and Iâ€™ll do my best to reply.

Thank you again for your support and understanding during this challenging time.

Best,
Rick Richard
Founder, Parsley

========================

A good sourcing tool should feel effortless. It should be there when you need it, and get out of the way when you don't. Parsley adds just the right touch to your sourcing efforts.

- Identifies Candidate & Client Profiles
- Eliminate Manual Copy & Paste
- Keeps Notes & History in Sync
- Manage Talent Folders / Tear Sheets
- Add to Jobs & Track Status
- Keep Data & Profile Pictures up to date

Built for the Power Recruiter

Life can be challenging staying on top of your client and candidate relationships. Especially when you're constantly hoping between your ATS and LinkedIn. Parsley brings clarity to your daily workflow so you can spend more time on things that actually matter - connecting with clients and candidates.

Bullhorn, JobAdder, or Vincere? We've got you covered.

Parsley was built to work with two of the most popular ATS platforms on the planet. So whether you recruit in Los Angeles, Boston, Sydney or London, Parsley should fit in nicely with your tech stack.
